resources.string: What do you wish to accomplish?
If you were to accomplish your goal, what would the outcome be? How would the outcome make you feel?
Take a second to visualize the outcome. What would success feel like to you?
Take a second to visualize the obstacle. What would it feel like to run into it?
What\'s a personal obstacle within yourself that could get in your way?
How would you tackle the obstacle?
How would you tackle the obstacle? Write a plan to tackle obstacle in if/then form. If (obstacle occurs), then (your plan of action)
Congratulations! You\'ve completed inputting your goal!
